entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 7 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
